glyph.name: Loving No (Applied Harmony)
glyph.description: A clear, loving 'no' actually strengthens relationships by establishing authentic boundaries. When your 'no' is honest and kind, your 'yes' becomes trustworthy and meaningful. This practice honors your truth without harming connection.
glyph.practice: Practice honoring your inner truth while maintaining love for the relationship. Cultivate the capacity to say no without guilt or need to justify extensively.

interpretation:
A smooth stone held in an open palm.
The stone gently placed in still, clear water.
Perfect, concentric ripples expand across the surface.
visualPhrases: A smooth stone held in an open palm.
The stone gently placed in still, clear water.
Perfect, concentric ripples expand across the surface.
